alert.note: Alert for Gallatin; Hardin (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 11 at 9:17AM CST until February 13 at 12:36PM CST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana...Kentucky...Illinois... Ohio River at J.T. Myers Dam, Shawneetown, Mount Vernon, and Newburgh Dam. .Recent precipitation caused the Ohio River to rise. The river at J.T. Meyers Dam, Shawneetown, Mount Vernon, and Newburgh Dam has already crested or will crest soon, and then they will all fall below flood stage this weekend. For the Ohio River...including J.T. Myers Dam, Shawneetown, Mount Vernon, and Newburgh Dam...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at Shawneetown. * WHEN...Until early Sunday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM CST Friday the stage was 35.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 35.8 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 33.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
